who we are

Jacoule Engineering Limited (JEL) is an exclusively Nigerian owned service company, primarily engaged in the provision of specialized Engineering, Procurement, Construction, Maintenance and Installation, along with Marine and logistics Solutions to the Oil and Gas Industry in Nigeria.

Our expertise, technology and comprehensive solutions deliver certainty and added value to all of our projects.
